Jaguar 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Jaguar vehicles. Curious to know what Jaguar model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Jaguar 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Jaguar models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Jaguar model changed across years or compare between different models of the Jaguar family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Jaguar 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Jaguar cars

Jaguar F-TYPE 0-60 3.4 - 5.1 sec 1/4 mile 11.7 @ 122 - 13.6 @ 101 mph
Jaguar XJ 0-60 3.8 - 6.9 sec 1/4 mile 12.1 @ 120 - 15.2 @ 93 mph
Jaguar XK 0-60 4.1 - 5.9 sec 1/4 mile 12.4 @ 112 - 14.6 @ 96 mph
Jaguar XE 0-60 4.2 - 9 sec 1/4 mile 12.7 @ 108 - 16.8 @ 83 mph
Jaguar XF 0-60 4.4 - 8.2 sec 1/4 mile 12.8 @ 111 - 16.7 @ 84 mph
Jaguar XKR 0-60 4.5 - 5.3 sec 1/4 mile 13.1 @ 105 - 13.9 @ 102 mph
Jaguar S-TYPE 0-60 5 - 8.6 sec 1/4 mile 13.6 @ 103 - 16.8 @ 86 mph
Jaguar F-PACE 0-60 5.1 - 8.2 sec 1/4 mile 13.6 @ 103 - 16.6 @ 84 mph
Jaguar XJ8 0-60 5.43 - 6.44 sec 1/4 mile 12.4 @ 0 - 13.15 @ 0 mph
Jaguar XJR 0-60 5.9 - 5.95 sec 1/4 mile 14.4 @ 0 - 14.5 @ 0 mph
Jaguar XK8 0-60 6 - 6.5 sec 1/4 mile 14.6 @ 96 - 15 @ 94 mph
Jaguar X-TYPE 0-60 6.2 - 8.1 sec 1/4 mile 14.7 @ 89 - 16.2 @ 84 mph
